name: Now Jade Riviera Cancun Resort & Spa

reviews.text: This is our second tirp to the Mayan, last year we stayed at the Barcelo Maya Colonial
reviews.title: This resort was very nice

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The now jade is very classy, the food excellent, the staff were awesome and very attentive, the rooms were clean and spacious. The only problem we had there was no atmosphere like there was at the Barcelo, there were few decorations or Christmas music playing unlike the Barcelo had. There was no interactive entertainment, unlike the barcelo, which had mini golf etc in fact a few of the entertainers were cancelled like the casino night which I heard from others was disappointing. We also asked 6 staff members where the pool that had activities like bingo as we had my 83 year old mother with us and no one could tell us. Not really impressed. The other thing that seemed odd was at the Barcelo we saw numerous wild lizards, birds and other animals and not a single thing at the Now Jade. would have loved mom to see something.
reviews.title: The best vacation ever!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We had upgraded to the preffered club when we booked, the private pool with no children running around was nice, the view from our room and the pool was amazing, to see cruise ships go by was great, the preffered lounge was the best Carlos was very attentive, and the free internet was nice, only in the preffered club and the food and drinks were fantastic. We had a jacuzzi on our balcony which was nice but there is absolutely on privacy! had to wear bathing suits which was ok except there was no tub in our room, awesome shower though, but mom would have liked a bath.
reviews.title: Wonderful Resort, best vacation ever!!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Our favorite restaurant was the steakhouse, the food was fantastic, and the servers the best we have ever had.
reviews.title: Very nice resort!

reviews.text: It was a bit if a challange to take a collectivo to Puerto morales (actually the highway outside of puerto morales) then another to Playa del Carmen, cost us 10 pesos each and we could stay as long as we wanted, by taking the transpotation from the resort as an excursion, it was 30 pesos and you only had 3 hours. The barcelo we were able to take a collective to Playa no transfers.
reviews.title: solid rating

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I stayed at Now Jade Jan. 9-13th 2011. I was blown away with the views right as I entered the lobby. My boyfriend and I opted for the Preferred Club so check in/out was so quick and simple. We used our jacuzzi only once but it was so nice to have that option. I loved having our own quiet pool just steps away from our suite. I did think it was a little nuts that I had to wake up so early to reserve a seat by the pool. The Preferred club was a great addition to our club with it's fully stocked bar and snacks. We were able to use the computers without any wait and the staff was there for you at beckon call. We tried every restaurant. The buffet was good, Spice and Cin Cin were at the bottom of my list. Capers and Tamarindo were my favorite and the French place was good too. We used the French place for breakfast (another perk of Preferred club). The room was clean and spacious, our view was amazing and the service was incredible. my only real complaint was that the beds were too firm for me but the rest of the room was great. Shower was large, living space was big as well. Every part of this resort was amazing and welcoming. We will definitely visit this place again.
reviews.title: Absolutely Amazing

reviews.text: We arrived on December 16, 2010, and departed on December 23, 2010.
reviews.title: Great Property, Great Serivce, Great Kids Club

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We enjoyed the property and the service. We were especially impressed with the staff that worked at the Kids Club. We want to highlight three employees at the Kids Club that we think were just great: Ms. Angelica, Ms. Rosillo, and Ms. Sophia. They were caring, fun, and responsible as they looked after our son. He had a great time.
reviews.title: Fabulous Experience!

reviews.text: In terms of food, the restraunt food was mediocre. That said, surprisingly, the buffet restraunt was great. Our advice, stick with the Mexican offerings and the items from the indoor grill. The property was wonderful. The beach is great. Fitness Center is nice. Pools are terrific.
reviews.title: WILL BE BACK
Air Transit Omni- Powerful to ruin our vacation!
reviews.text: We will recommend the property to others.

We loved it. Had a great time over Thanksgiving week with our 2 year old. Stayed in Preferred Club building 9. Awesome view of the adult pool and the ocean. The room was "ocean view" upgraded upon arrival. We just booked an ocean from Preferred Club room for April and so did another couple that is coming with us. We would even do an Ocean View room Non Preferred Club but that was sold out.
reviews.title: Love it. Going back in April

reviews.text: The people that I hear complaining booked the basic tropical view room and there are some that are not so desirable.
reviews.title: FANTASTIC RESORT, Phooeey to the naysayers!!!

reviews.text: Food was great for us. Coors Light and top shelf liquor is available in many parts of the resort. Never did the buffet but went to dinner around 6pm every night. You do need to get to dinner early to get a table quickly.
reviews.title: DO NOT STAY HERE! ABSOLUTELY HORRIFIC FROM START TO FINISH

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I did not tip $5 all the time. A dollar or two was great for the people that serve you on the beach (without you even asking).
reviews.title: Perfect.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Beach service and Adult Pool bar was awesome. Spoke good english and aimed to please. Occupancy was high the week we stayed and service was great.
reviews.title: VERY RELAXING

reviews.text: This was the fourth different resort we stayed in the Cancun/Riviera Maya are in the last 5 years and we had an excellent stay.
reviews.title: Great resort in Puerto Morelos

reviews.text: Check in was fine, we were quickly taken care of and the front desk clerk even upgraded our room to an ocean view one in building 1. The room was spacious and beautiful, and the ocean view was a nice plus. Room service could have been better, we had to call almost everyday for them to come clean our room. Only in one they they left a towel shaped as an animal on our bed and some times they would take the four towels and return only three. No big deal though, calling the reception desk solved any minor issues we had. The staff around the resort was great with a very few exceptions. Folks were helpful and polite. Wireless internet costs $77 per week. Access was slow though.
reviews.title: Wonderful Wedding! Fabulous Ana Maria Cruz Wedding Co Ordinator!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The food was great. We ate most of the time at the buffet. There was a good variety and you could get fresh food at any time at the pasta, grilling, and oriental food stations. Most of the waiters were very attentive. We went to only two a la carte restaurants, since it was difficult to take the children to those. The Italian restaurant was really disappointing; bad food and service. The oriental restaurant was excellent though, the food was good, the service as well, we had a great time there. There are no need for reservations. We were promptly seated at the Italian restaurant but had a 1 hour wait for the oriental one. We only order food in our room once and it took them around 40 minutes to deliver. Food was good though.
reviews.title: Excellent all-inclusive resort

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The pools are nice. The infinity pool was beautiful but a bit too cold (at least in January). The pool with the bar was heated, which was great. The kids pool was warmer than the infinity but colder than the bar pool. It was an average kids pool though. It wasn't very hard to get spots around the pool. There are no needs for towels cards in this hotel, which is good because you can get as many towels as you want, but is bad because people use towels to reserve good spots on the beach and pool.
reviews.title: fantastic

reviews.text: The beach is beautiful but the ocean is really rocky as most people mentioned. Bring some water shoes if you wish to go into the water. I went scuba diving at the hotel. The boat ride to the reef is about 15 minutes. They have snorkeling trips as well.
reviews.title: Has potential.... did not meet my expectations

aka: Now Jade Riviera Cancun Resort And Spa
description: Now Jade Riviera Cancun. Located just 12 miles from Cancun International Airport and minutes from the quaint fishing town of Puerto Morelos, Now Jade Riviera Cancun provides guests with 2,640 feet of pure crystal white sand and refreshing azure waters. Guests will become immersed in a setting where style and sophistication meet relaxation and comfort. Each suite is truly exquisite featuring beautiful views of flourishing gardens or crystal clear ocean. This unique property features 550 luxurious suites each complete with private furnished balcony or terrace and Jacuzzi for two. All finely appointed suites offer king size or two double beds, marble floors, air-conditioning with in-room climate control, daily refreshed mini bars and 24-hour room and concierge services. Snorkel, kayak, windsurf or deep sea dive in the vast blue waters or simply relax under the warmth of the sun on the white sandy beach. Perfect your golf swing on one of the famous courses located nearby or indulge a vast set of treatments offered at the world- class spa. Little ones will have the opportunity to partake in many day and nighttime activities provided by the Explorer’s Club for Kids. When the sun sets come enjoy live themed shows in our large indoor theater or sip on a cocktail as you relax at Eclipse Night Club. All this and much more await you at Now Jade Riviera Cancun.
